Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI had a more vague form of feedback while teachers gave more personal comments and also better written as they have gone through the same assignment with other students and thus have a base to compare.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt slightly more positive when I receive feedback from my teacher.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes GenAI provides redundant feedback that is not part of the rubrics so it is not useful.
